item.description:
Healer Share! We usually have Reiki in one room and Full Spectrum in the other room. Come on down and practice your healing. Give a healing and get one too! $10 donation.

Come on down and practice your techniques - we have a very diverse group of healers. In 2 hours, you'll get to experience the modalities above - plus others such as Shamanic, Quantum Touch, The Reconnection & Yuen Method to name a few - depending who shows up.

There are often 10-15 tables - depending on attendance.

Don't gauge the number of attendees by the RSVP number, as we often have 15-30 people attending with 0 RSVP replies on meetup.com.  (though RSVPs are welcome)

Lisa Campion carried on this tradition for more than a decade. As Lisa steps aside quietly to pursue other interests, a few of us will maintain the Solstice Healer Share tradition of fun, friendship and bringing benefit to others.

This is by far the best share in the area. Thank you Lisa.

 

This will probably be the last share for the summer months.   Our next share will be in mid September.

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Healer Share - the sequel
